page.title: 03Linlithgow Gala Day.
page.content: In Linlithgow traditional festivals are celebrated, one of the main ones being the Gala Day.It is a children's festival which started in 1930 and has carried on since then_apart from when World War II was in progress. This year's dowager queen, who is an ex_pupil of our school,said she found the day"very tiring."She wore a dress of white taffeta with lace on the bodice and a frill on the hem.The lady who was chosen to crown last year's queen was our Assistant Head Teacher. She told us that she felt it was a great honour to have been chosen although she was nervous and excited on the day. This year's queen,who is also a pupil of this school,said,"I think the Gala Day will be one of the most exciting and unforgettable days of my life!"
